string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Do you think that the minimum wage should be increased to 15$ by 2021?
Do you think changes to the hospital fee program should require voter approval?
Do you think that we should allow bilingual education in public schools.

string-array.name: costs
string-array.item: Government spending will increase in the billions and tax revenues will change as some companies may leave CA.
The state will gain between 500 million a year to eventually earn 1 billion a year. Hospitals will receive 250 million in yearly government spending that will increase every year.
